definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: From now on you are the official Statue of Liberty of this street.
sentences.chinese: 从今以后，你就是这条街上名正言顺的自由神像。

sentences.english: Close-up of Statue of Liberty in New York City on Nov. 1, 1983. (AP Photo/ Dave Pickoff)
sentences.chinese: 1983年11月1日，纽约自由女神像的特写。

sentences.english: Live in NYC and never been to the Statue of Liberty?
sentences.chinese: 居住在纽约市但是从来没看过自由女神像？

sentences.english: The maenad on the right is playing a tambourine.
sentences.chinese: 而神像右边的女祭司正演奏著小手鼓。

sentences.english: And he answered and said, Babylon is fallen, is fallen; and all the graven images of her gods he hath broken unto the ground.
sentences.chinese: 倾倒了，他一切雕刻的神像，都打碎于地。

sentences.english: Do not turn to idols or make gods of cast metal for yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们不可偏向虚无的神，也不可为自己铸造神像。

sentences.english: 1885 - The Statue of Liberty arrives in New York Harbor.
sentences.chinese: 1885年的今天，自由女神像抵达纽约港。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter introduces usage of PanYao ceremonial paintings.
sentences.chinese: 第五章论述的是神像画的使用。

sentences.english: Temples and statues decay, but books survieve.
sentences.chinese: 寺庙会倒坍，神像会朽烂，而书却经久长存。

sentences.english: On a ferryboat in New York Harbor. We can see the Statue of Liberty.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约港的渡船上，我们可以看到远处的自由女神像。

sentences.english: They are visiting the statue of the god Memnon.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在参观门农神像。

sentences.english: This god which has the head of a cow was normally placed inside a mummy.
sentences.chinese: 这种牛头人身的神像通常被放在木乃伊体内。

sentences.english: Then, after a stretch arms and body like a goddess with a veil floating in the air over the region.
sentences.chinese: 于是一个两臂后伸，身带披纱的女神像飘然而至。

sentences.english: In the second chapter, we mainly discuss the manufacture of PanYao ceremonial paintings.
sentences.chinese: 第二章我们主要描述的是盘瑶神像画的绘制情况。

sentences.english: I would like to establish a production-oriented enterprises statues, is now in preparation.
sentences.chinese: 我欲建立一个以生产神像为主的企业，现在正筹建中。

definition: icon/iconic/religious image/figure (of Confucius, Buddha, Jesus Christ, the Virgin Mary etc)/CL:張|张[zhang1]
to consecrate/to enshrine and worship/an offering (to one's ancestors)/a sacrifice (to a God)
niche for statue (esp. Buddhist, Christian etc)
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
Buddhist image/statue of Buddha or Bodhisattva/CL:尊[zun1], 張|张[zhang1]
